title: Ring: length
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
+ Documentation about (*Ring).Len()[1] should clarify that the computation is regardless
of their Values (nil or otherwise).

+ Since that it's computing the maximum number of values that can be held in the data
structure, then could be called `Cap()` rather than `Len` to avoid confussion. Whether
it might increase its size using (*Ring).Link or decrease it using (*Ring).Unlink (in
the future).


[1]: http://golang.org/pkg/container/ring/#Ring.Len
